text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam convallis faucibus elit a mollis. Donec tempor volutpat felis nec mattis. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia curae; In porta dignissim elit, in convallis augue lobortis nec. Integer egestas eget augue et interdum.
author: Lipsum

text: Reveal to me everything you find ugly about yourself, so I can reveal to you everything I find beautiful about you.
author: Juansen Dizon

text:
Like two stars in the depths of the sky
This gravity is just irresistible
We spin around each other, you and I
When I fell for you, I fell into your orbit.
author: Justin Wetch

text:
I'm wrapped in you.
Melting in your silhouette
and becoming one,
a strange contour of love,
flowing with the wind.
author: Emily Brandt

text: I bet you make babies smile
